context_text: <B> yeah and it almost seems like they should be instead of affirmative action being something where you just hire somebody or admit somebody on the the basis of race or or gender um maybe affirmative action should concentrate more on raising those people up to where they actually have the qualifications / <A> right / <B> you know instead of giving them the job what about giving them the education somehow / <A> right / <B> uh but at the same time not uh discriminating against people who who actually really had the qualifications you know { and } / <A> [ right ] / <B> face it they need the job as much as anybody else just because you are a white male doesn't mean you don't need to go to work / <A> exactly
